casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James Harold COURTNEY, III 160P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 1, 2018 Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Courtney, James Harold (III) Jess D. Mekeel, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina,

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of May 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of June 2018."
